channel.title: Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos
channel.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Chaos is broadcasting for the last time from his Brooklyn apartment. We talk conspiracy theories about the Taliban. Chris ALREADY has some pool issues. We chat with Ti Ti's parole officer. How should we celebrate Ti Ti's birthday in Florida? Sound off in the comments. Vinny chimes in and talks about how hard moving is with Mr.Chaos. We answer a few fan questions. One fan has some WILD ideas about what's really going on in the world right now. CHAOS!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy
FOLLOW THE CLIPS PAGE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbu7rQDxBYMsuKQeX-x4fEQ/videos

Chrissy Chaos is broadcasting for the last time from his Brooklyn apartment. We talk conspiracy theories about the Taliban. Chris ALREADY has some pool issues. We chat with Ti Ti's parole officer. How should we celebrate Ti Ti's birthday in Florida? Sound off in the comments. Vinny chimes in and talks about how hard moving is with Mr.Chaos. We answer a few fan questions. One fan has some WILD ideas about what's really going on in the world right now. CHAOS!

item.title: World Series GARBAGE with Kevin Ryan & H. Foley from Are You Garbage? | Chris Distefano is Chrissy Chaos | EP 92
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! Chrissy Chaos is joined by comedians Kevin Ryan & H. Foley from @AreYouGarbage? Comedy Podcast the babes kick it off fresh off some shit talking!! Chris talks about how the World Series in Philly screwed up his weekend! We are getting thrown out of the studio!! WHERE WILL THE CHAOS GO NEXT?!? What is the trashiest state in America? Chris talks about hosting @FOX 5 New York in a hot dog costume. How crazy do sports fans go when their team wins.....Foley is trying to go on a weight loss journey. Making movies is a tough hustle. Man helps his cousin run from the police live on tv. Weird things you would do as a kid. Is flying on a private plane safe? The hard parts of being a comedian on the road. Flying first class is addicting. Why are taxes so difficult to get ahead of. We answer some patreon questions from the fans!
SUPPORT THE SPONSORS TO SUPPORT THE CHAOS GO.FACTOR75.com/chaos60 code chaos60 drinktrade.com/chaos rsvlts.com/chrissychaos code chrissychaos https://www.rsvlts.com/collections/chrissy-chaos/?sort=manual&utm_medium=partnership&utm_source=chrissychaos&handle=chrissychaos&handle=chrissychaos&handle=chrissychaos&

item.title: Chrissy in The Troubles | Chris Distefano is Chrissy Chaos | EP 90
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Chaos is back from his tour of the UK and Ireland! He talks about his travels and what he learned about being an American. Chrissy PINTER was chugging beers and carbs overseas. Irish accents are the best accents of all time. Chris loved his time in UK learning about the Queen. Chris is addicted to scones. WHAT IS A SCONE!? Chrissy Histories talks about The Troubles in Ireland. Ireland was pure war and chaos for over 800 years. Chris breaks down what it means to be in the IRA. Kanye West is having a full mental breakdown on Drink Champs and in the media. Fame is hell. Chris breaks down why you don't want to be Kanye or Pete Davidson these days.
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy
SUPPORT THE SPONSORS TO SUPPORT THE CHAOS drinktrade.com/chaos mizzenandmain.com code chaos If you like the RSVLTS shirt Chris is wearing in this video or have seen him wear before, check out our curated RSVLTS x Chrissy Chaos collection page where you can shop a bunch of other gear as well. Use the code ChrissyChaos at checkout for 20% off your first order!

item.title: David Blaine STOLE MY GIRLFRIEND! with Robert Kelly | Chris Distefano is Chrissy Chaos | EP 89
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Chaos is joined by comedian Robert Kelly from the You Know What DUDE podcast! His new special Kill Box is out now on Louieck.com! WATCH THAT! Chris only gets half a glass of water today!!! Bobby has to poop BAD.....can he make it the whole show squeezing?!? Pimp got Chris some fun birthday gifts! The boys talk about poop in its many forms. Bobby talks about his weight loss journey. Take control of your life! Why is dealing with doctors so hard? Bobby's new diet. David Blaine stole Chris ex gf. Boston pop quizz for Bobby! Louie CK directed Bobby's new special. Wedding gone wrong! Bobby loves to scream. Fighting is a love language. The myth of the comedy cellar table from the 90s. Chris and Bobby answer some patreon questions!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy
SUPPORT THE SPONSORS TO SUPPORT THE CHAOS adamandeve.com code chaos trymiracle.com/chaos betterhelp.com/chaos

item.title: Irelands Finest with Joanne McNally | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | BONUS EP
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Chaos is joined by comedian Joanne McNally! Chris is bringing the CHAOS to Ireland! Who is the Jesus of Ireland?! Chris gets introduced to some new Irish slang words and the lifestyle of the Irish. Shout out @Jessica Kirson and Des Bishop! The differences between the comedy scene in New York and Ireland. Chris breaks down his current relationship status. Is stand up comedy oversaturated? What does Ireland think of Trump. Avril lavigne is acting strange at meet and greets. Go see the CHAOS in Ireland babes!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Escaping Arrest with Sam Morril | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 86
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Chaos is joined by comedian @Sam Morril who has a new Netflix special out now! Sam is fresh off of some rough flights. Staten Island is a different world. Sam drops some HOT new merch! The state of comedy is LIT. Is Brazil the Florida of Central American. Woman has twins that are from 2 different fathers. A fight breaks out at a Detriot Lions football game. 9/11 memories. Fighting with airlines gets HEATED. NBA Referees have strange lives. Charles Barkley kisses a man. Will Chris get in trouble over seas on tour? Sam cracks open a bottle of his new whiskey line "Bodega Cat Whiskey." Sam shares a Luke Wilson story. Making money on the road. Road Rage is dangerous. We answer a few patreon questions from the fans!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: The Last GREAT Queen with Mike Cannon | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 85
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chris is joined by comedian @Mike Cannon and they talk what role partying plays in your life growing up. Can drugs be a good thing? The power of psychedelics and the impact they can have on your life. Mike goes to his first concert and weeps. Chris turned 38! Be comfortable with who you are in this life! Hooters waitress commits a CRAZY crime. Why is all the weird stuff happening at once lately? How many crisis' can we face at once. Can we ever trust politicians again? Ron DeSantis goes wild at a speech. We take some zoom calls from patreon members! A World War Two bunker trick. Chris talks Leonardo da Vinci and the truth about his existence.
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Taking Magic Mushrooms with Mike Cannon & Adam Gilbert | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 83
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! THE CHAOS IS IN FULL SWING THIS WEEK!!! Chris is joined by comedians Mike Cannon & Adam Gilbert and they convince him to try mushrooms for the first time ON AIR!!!! STRAP IN!!! The boys talk the dark side of being on the road for comedy. Invest in yourself! Have fun life is about more than work. Chris is excited for his shows in Europe and Ireland. Dealing with your parents divorce in your 20s. Be grateful for where you are at in your life you only get it once. We get to know Adam Gilbert AKA LIL STINKER!!!! Chris has a bad rash on his taint. Chris got way too drunk at JFL in Canada. We find out that Adam has mushrooms on him......CHRIS TRIES MUSHROOMS FOR THE FIRST TIME ON AIR!!! The rest of Chrissy Mushrooms is hitting patreon this friday!!! Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Ruth Bader Glassman | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 82
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! The CHAOS is back in studio with @Rick Glassman who is going deep undercover for his upcoming role as Ruth Bader Ginsburg. Rick and Chris were JFL Fresh Faces. ALLERGIES are SUS! What causes allergies. Rick takes a stand for what he believes in! Rick gets too heated at basketball games and got him kicked out of his basketball league. 16 weird facts about Ruth Bader Ginsburg! Rick and Chris start flirting. Shout out chubby indian women! We do a deep dive into the TRUTH about Queen Elizabeth the first. Make up in ancient times was poison and would slowly make the royalty go INSANE. Rick had anxiety about his first kiss happening on Hitlers birthday. Gandhi is a freaking jerk!!! Love comes and goes marry your best friend. Chris has fantasies of not having babies. The boys talk p0rn stars! We jump into Chris' trauma and Rick really goes DEEP! The rest of this interview is only on patreon.com/chrisdcomedy Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

What causes allergies. Rick takes a stand for what he believes in! Rick gets too heated at basketball games and got him kicked out of his basketball league. 16 weird facts about Ruth Bader Ginsburg! Rick and Chris start flirting. Shout out chubby indian women! We do a deep dive into the TRUTH about Queen Elizabeth the first. Make up in ancient times was poison and would slowly make the royalty go INSANE. Rick had anxiety about his first kiss happening on Hitlers birthday. Gandhi is a freaking jerk!!! Love comes and goes marry your best friend. Chris has fantasies of not having babies. The boys talk p0rn stars! We jump into Chris' trauma and Rick really goes DEEP! The rest of this interview is only on patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.title: THE PLANET IS MELTING! | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 78
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This week Chris is coming to you live from Pete Davidsons apartment. Chris is in the apartment that Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson most definitely (not sure) fell in love in! But now it’s the new CHRISSY CHAOS STUDIO!! 🙌 THIS IS A HOT EPISODE TO GO WITH THE HOT MELTING PLANET 😅😩🤣 THANKS Kylie Jenner for ruining the planet with your 3minute private jet rides in Los Angeles. We’re told about TiTi Jerry’s breakfast prison stories, I Am Papi segments and Christories. Yep we’re continuing with segments Bubbas! This week’s Christories is about Ancient Rome’s Colosseum. What a crazy structure !! Listen to this crazy episode about history, fat asses, and just more Chaos!!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Theodore Roosevelt is Andrew Schulz | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 77
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy CHAOS is mid RONA but the content won't STOP! Chris talks about the baby eating it's own poop. Then Chrissy Histories breaks down the INSANE life of Theodore Roosevelt......we realize he was the OG Andrew Schulz. Check out Schulz's new special out now! All the people of the past were never perfect.....would Teddy survive woke culture? Chrissy NEWS CYCLE is hot on the trending headlines! People are sneaking into houses in the Hamptons. New trend is for people to sneakily live inside your house without you knowing. CHAOS!

item.title: Trump OnlyFans with Ti Ti Jerry & Tampa Tony | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 75
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy CHAOS is live on the 4th of July from a backyard BBQ. Chris tries pork! Chris is joined by Ti Ti Jerry and his father Tampa Tony. Ti Ti breaks down the R Kelly case. What is federal prison? Ti Ti is excited for her boyfriend to get out of prison. Whats a first date after serving time like? Ti Ti wants to go on a cruise. Chris wants to take viagra for the patreon. Chris wants Tampa Tony to get ripped for his 75th birthday. What's your reason for living? How do we get gas prices down!? Joe Biden vs Trump in penis size? WHO YOU GOT?! NYC is not safe these days. item.description:

item.title: Vote for Pedro with Pete Alonso | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 73
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy CHAOS is live from the NEW YORK METS dugout! Pete Alonso joins the show and wants all the chaos fans to get out there and vote for him in the All Star Game. Chris asks Pete about his career in baseball, his glutes, aliens being real, dugout poops, and making baseball exciting again. Second half of the ep Chris is enjoying his new robe and gossiping about his life from a box at CitiField.

item.title: Chrissy Meets Marshmello | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 72
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy CHAOS has his new shirt on is fully in the FOG! Chris talks about meeting Marshmello at an influencer event. What is life in the future gonna be like....Chris goes to New York Nico's film debut at the Tribeca Film Festival. Classic New York nights with Chrissy D. The diet is going great! Justin Bieber has Ramsay Hunt syndrome. Why does it feel like more people are in open relationships? Chris loves the new George Carlin documentary. Can nihilism be healthy? Accept everything and don't resist. 7 transgender animals. Chrissy answers some questions from the patreon members!

item.title: Pride Boys with Joey Camasta & Barstool Pat | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 71
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy CHAOS rings in Pride month with the queens of the GAYS! Joey Camasta & Barstool Pat!!! Who else is going gay this month?!?! YASSSSS! How gay is Barstool Sports? Fire Island on Netflix is amazing. We learn a lot about the PRIDE world this episode. Can people in the closet celebrate pride? @TheHomelessPimp went to a kink party last week. What's the strangest kink you ever heard of? Shaving your pups is SUS. What color is Chris' butthole. Tim Dillon is the king of the gays. Chris donated sperm when he was young. What era of men were hottest? Who is the sexiest player in the NBA? The girls make plans to march in this years Pride Parade in NYC. What's the gayest thing you have ever done. Best bathrooms to hook up in!? Chris claims his block is diverse. Ti Ti found freedom in prison. Chris had skin tags on his ass cheeks. PRIDE MONTH ALL MONTH GIRLS YASSS!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Summer of CHAOS! | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 70
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy CHAOS is on his solo tip!! Ti TI Jerry is back!!!!! What a great 70 eps of chaos it has been. Ti Ti talks about going to the hospital. Ti Ti doesn't want to take her meds. Chris goes to a Dominican pool party and learns a lot. Latinos are all about love and connection. Ti Ti's sweetheart gets out of prison in 4 months. Should Ti Ti start an Only Fans? IG thots getting paid to go on vacation with gross guys. Science is in charge of society now. Some summer tips from Ti Ti! Chaos patreon flash mob is coming to NYC!!! Jazzy Method actually comes on the pod for the first time!!! Should Chris and Jazz get married? Chris talks about why he doesn't believe in marriage. What do we do with the mental health issue and the homeless? Rolling blackouts are coming all summer YASSSS! Chris talks Joe Rogan aftermath. How was it to be on the Joe Rogan Experience. We answer some patreon questions!!!! What US president would you wanna sleep with?
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Ayahuasca Training with Gareth Reynolds | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 69
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy CHAOS is joined this week by comedian Gareth Reynolds from the Dollop Podcast. Chris talks about his WILD landscaper who won't stop drunk texting him. Tupox is airborne everyone be safe. SHOW YA BUSH! Chris' father is really insane. Chris is doing Joe Rogan's podcast this week! Chris and Gareth talk about their time on the MTV show Failosophy. Hollywood parties are LAME. Quitting Coffee is hard to do and has side effects. We get some ayahuasca training from Gareth. Ayahuasca is a South American psychoactive brew used both socially and as ceremonial spiritual medicine among the indigenous peoples of the Amazon basin. He also gives us some tips for using DMT. How to open your third eye and live a better life. Mushrooms are a tool to open your mind. Money and success aren't the answers to depression. AOC boyfriend is SUS. Life is about balance and fart jokes. FULL CHAOS BABY!

item.title: Elon Musk is in DANGER! with Mike Cannon | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 67
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy CHAOS is joinedThis week we are joined by @mikecannon Check out his comedy Special White Privilege Homeless out May 18th on YouTube! CHECK IT OUT ! Mike and Chris are old friends who have comedy specials out around the same time and worked on by @thehomelesspimp and @NYVideoGuy too! Speshy Weshy is on Netflix, go give it two thumbs up! Mike had food poisoning last week so they keep the topics light. WE MUST SAVE ELON MUSK FROM RUSSIA!!! Diving straight into billionaire, Elon Musk! He claims that he may die ‘under mysterious circumstances’. Okay??! Quickly pivot to Boston Bomber, cute or fuckboi? Imagine going to jail for life so young! Your life is basically over, right? Should you be allowed to choose between euthanasia or going to jail if that young?! NASA says they are going to launch nudes to aliens, what are we sending? Which nudes should be sent first? Ripped actors from The Northman or Elliot Page? We talk about who really directed and produced Kim Kardashian and Ray J's sex tape and who would play Chris in a movie?!!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy
FOLLOW THE CLIPS PAGE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbu7rQDxBYMsuKQeX-x4fEQ/videos

item.title: Nuclear ANXIETY! with Joe List | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 65
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy CHAOS is joined by comedian Joe List! You know him from his podcast @Tuesdays with Stories and his comedy special Are You Mad At Me? Joe just recently closed his Netflix account, but will open it again for Chris' comedy special, Speshy Weshy, and John Wayne Gacy documentary. Chris's new favorite show, Conversations with a Killer: John Wayne Gacy Tapes where he explains his handcuff tricks, what a psycho clown! Joe and Chris remember the last time working together was on The Impractical Jokers Cruise, in February of 2020, WILD. Joe is not really in the know about Elon Musk buying Twitter, but he is down with wearing women's underwear!The boys talk about shit going down on planes lately - no masks, Mike Tyson punching other passengers, and mile high club? You decide if it was..... Mike Tyson can't fight Joe list though, he trains as a MMA and Jiu Jitsu fighter, DON'T MESS WITH JOE!-- check it out! Boys close it out with Joe giving Chris some advice on how to do Joe Rogan's podcast. WHAT SHOULD CHRIS TALK ABOUT WITH JOE ROGAN!?
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy
FOLLOW THE CLIPS PAGE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbu7rQDxBYMsuKQeX-x4fEQ/videos

item.title: Mermaids, Ghosts & PU$$Y | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 58
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Histories is here to start the episode and let us know what NATO is, little histories on the Cold War, Berlin Wall and what Putin is doing today. Chris is having a rant but listen in and learn about Ukraine vs. Russia. We are team Ukraine especially because Putin, if you accidentally hurt someone that is transgendered, that helps boost American morale and then Biden will interfere! Is Putin the richest and strongest man in the world? He records all this content, seems a bit like the Michael Scott of dictators, no?! The Chaos crew takes a break from World War III to talk about what's happening with Kanye and Kim and Pete. Kanye West, well known now as Ye, released a new music video with The Game called Eazy. In the video he kidnaps, decapitates and buries a cremation version of Pete Davidson. But at the end of the video says, JK. Oh okay.. still pretty chilling. Anyways, are mermaids real? Is Mark Cuban a good billionaire? We go back to thinking about Kim's power and let's just be honest, pussy power is real! Happy Women's month guys! Listen just try to be a good person, ignore Trump supporting Putin (yikes) and be happy that one of Chris' friends is growing up! Also Bubbas stop drinking Diet coke as it may tie to ADHD and try to find Chris' dissertation.
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy
FOLLOW THE CLIPS PAGE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbu7rQDxBYMsuKQeX-x4fEQ/videos

item.title: SECRETS of the Jewelry Industry | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 57
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This week the KING of CHAOS is joined by Shim a Jewelry expert! He tells us the SECRETS of the Jewelry Industry. Uncut Gems is real and it's fukin CRAZY!!!! Shim tells us how it was to sell chains to Jay-Z and other famous rappers. New York's gold business' are SUS. Shim talks about riding the subway transporting pure gold bars. How do you know if your jewelry is real or fake. Don't trust jewelers they always steal from you. Shim served in the Israel forces and arrested many terrorists. Is war covid safe?! The jewelry business is dangerous and lawless. People use gold and jewelry to hide money from the drug trade. The jewish mafia is real and is SCARY! Secret jewelry factories are in every city. Chris is getting a gun and asks Shim for some tips. Jay-Z was nasty to Shim. Chris has his Jewelry appraised live on air! Gold is a mysterious substance. Where does it come from and why is it so valuable. EVERYONE BUY GOLD!!!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Hit Em Wit The Semolina! with LIL “MO” MOZZARELLA | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 53
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Chaos is back on Staten Island with "comedian" LIL “MO” MOZZARELLA!!!! You might have seen Lil Mo on @Sidetalk Lil Mo puts us on to his Semolina lifestyle! We talk growing up Italian, Mo's talks about his rise to social media fame and how it all happened. Does Lil Mo believe in ghosts?!?! THIS EPISODE IS CHAOS! Social media is a crazy tool if you use it right. Lil Mo talks being friends with French Montana. How to deal with crazy people. Shout out the first woman drafted by the NBA. RIP QUEEN. The bathroom test.
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Sexuality is a HOAX with Ian Fidance | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 45
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Chaos is joined by COMEDIAN Ian Fidance this week! Chrissy needs to stay fresh and will be getting a haircut during todays episode. Shout out Jeremy from Cartel Hair Studio in SoHo. We get to the bottom of sexuality and what it means to be bisexual. When was your first time fooling around with a guy. What makes you gay? Is lust a negative thing? Alec Baldwin is in bad trouble, him and his wife delete their social media. The cuomo's are taking a BEATING. Elon Musk's new haircut is WILD. Social media and porn has ruined everything. Addiction is the root of humanity. WE find out what Ian's rockbottom was. How to know you have a drinking problem. The worst day Ian has ever lived. Being in jail before a job interview. Chris is LIT off his new David Goggins book! LETS GO! Everything is in your head. Most of life is just a reflection of what you fill your head with. Stay in the FOG. People need to be more open with themselves and their point of views. WE HAVE A BIG SURPRISE FOR IAN!!!!!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy
FOLLOW THE CLIPS PAGE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbu7rQDxBYMsuKQeX-x4fEQ/videos

item.title: Halloween Queens | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 39
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Chaos aka AOC is joined by Ti Ti Jerry aka J-Lo to celebrate Halloween!!! Who do you think has the better costume this year?! Ti Ti has stopped taking her Estrogen pills. She wants to keep it natural. Ti Ti hasn't had a man in 2 years! WHO THINKS THEY CAN HANDLE J-LO. Men are full of it! Tax the rich YASSSS GURL! These 2 dope queens cover some of the top headlines around the world. China has nukes, serial killers died via swamp, and more! We test Ti Ti's knowledge of history! How was Halloween in prison? A few classic stories from prison. Ti Ti wants to see Chris and Vinny get married. What was the craziest thing you did as a kid? WIG SWAP BABES! Ti Ti talks about her school days. Ti Ti talks about how she got her face scars. AOC does her own laundry! Ti Ti is PR Hillary Clinton! Ti Ti admits she isn't scared of anything on this planet.
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Breaking Amish with Joe Santagato | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 37
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Chaos is back in the basement with this weeks guest JOE SANTAGATO from the Basement Yard Podcast. Chris vents to Joe about how the road is taking a toll on him. Another new hidden cost has popped up in Chris' new home. Chris is feeling rundown from running around the country. More diet problems from Chrissy B!tch hips. Shout out salads. Koreans are number one! Chris finds out what race Joe is. Joe's first sexual memory. Is North Korea SUS? Joe believes aliens are real. The boys get lost in the Amish lifestyle. Could you go full Amish? What do the Amish believe? How do the Amish live? Do the Amish go to the dentist? WE KNOW THE TRUTH ABOUT DENTISTS! Homelesspimp spelling bee is coming soon. Hitler has a baby piece. CHAOS!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: LIFE IS A CONSPIRACY | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 33
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
Chrissy Chaos is broadcasting for the last time from his Brooklyn apartment. We talk conspiracy theories about the Taliban. Chris ALREADY has some pool issues. We chat with Ti Ti's parole officer. How should we celebrate Ti Ti's birthday in Florida? Sound off in the comments. Vinny chimes in and talks about how hard moving is with Mr.Chaos. We answer a few fan questions. One fan has some WILD ideas about what's really going on in the world right now. CHAOS!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.title: Aliens are HERE! with Bobby Lee | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 27
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Bobby Lee join the CHAOS! Chrissy Chaos defends himself from Bobby Lee popping off on him. DRAMA! Bobby doesn't know he's from North Korea.....What's really going on in North Korea? Bobby want's to reshoot Annie but in North Korea. Is Bobby Lee a problematic asian? Bobby talks about using Meth at 12 years old. Bobby takes a stance on aliens. Aliens are here among us! Bobby tells a story about his first encounter with the alien world. SHOUT OUT AA! Shout OUT Little Greys! Racism is real! Bobby Lee talks about his first kiss and first love. Bobby Lee's childhood home was haunted. Him and his brother experienced demonic possessions on multiple occasions. Bobby tells a few Comedy Store ghost stories. Sam Kinison was attacked by ghosts at the Comedy Store. The golden age of internet comedy content is upon us! Should we all band together and make the wildest movie ever made?!? Let us know in the comments CHRISTIANS!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Completely OFF The Rails! | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 24
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos is running on NO SLEEP and things go OFF THE RAILS! The new baby runs the house and shits on everyone! Baby poop is cute. Shout out Breast Milk, it's the key to life! Breast Milk facts. The connection between a Mother and the baby is CRAZY. When is a father the most useful to his kids? Chris breaks down how he's gonna deal with raising a teenager. We check the status of Chris' new daughter's gender. WHY DO COWS EXIST! COWSPIRACY! Chris going in on those milk bags. Chris is on NO sleep and running off the rails!! His diet is falling apart! Shout out Nick Cannon AKA the WOMB RAIDER! Chris breaks down what's going on with Bill Cosby. COSPIRACY! Ti Ti Jerry stops by for a bit and things go full chaos! Ti Ti talks about the time she escaped from Police custody in the 90s. We answer a few fan questions YASSSS! When we die are we reborn? Who would you wanna be born as? CHAOS!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.title: Hot Girl Summer with Ti Ti Jerry | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 22
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos is kicking off hot girl summer with Ti Ti Jerry! Chris new show on TruTV is coming out July 8th! Make sure you check out Backyard Bar Wars on TruTV. What's your nightmare show to be known for? Chris bombed in front of the Mets owner at a corporate gig. Ti Ti Jerry is over cleaning the Chaos house and pops on the PODDY! Ti Ti talks about freebasing cocaine and how it felt. What's the worst drug you have ever done? Is there air conditioning in prisons? Ti Ti tells us about a time she almost passed out from being too hot in prison. Ti Ti weighs in on Transgender weightlifter in New Zealand’s Olympic team. Shout out Tyra Banks! Ti Ti is coming for America's Next Top Model!! We warn Ti Ti about the dangers of being a model. Ti Ti on Manhattan City Council candidate caught with dominatrix in leaked video. NYC mayor race is heating up! Ti Ti is cleaning houses in the NYC area! We answer a few fan questions. Ti Ti thinks everyone should be single this summer and enjoy a true hot girl summer! What makes Ti Ti mad. Ti Ti spent most her life in prison so we are starting a new series called Ti Ti's bucket list! Coming soon to patreon. Ti Ti puts Chrissy Teigen on BLAST! Ti Ti talks about what it was like to experience 9/11 while being in prison. CHAOS!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Livin La Vida Loca | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 21
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos is anxious about his new daughter being born within the next week! Vin has to give birth to an 8 pound baby! Chris is hitting the road doing stand up comedy! Make sure to check him out while he's in your city! Woman gives birth to baby while in coma. Chris and Vin admit their babies were ugly babies. What animals pull out? Vin and Chris talk about if they are going to get their tubes tied and/or a vasectomy for Chrissy D. Should Chris get a vasectomy? Let us know in the comments LOL. Chris talks about Jon Stewart's Wuhan bit on late night with Stephen Colbert. Billie Eilish said some WILD things on social media. Chris vs Dad Jokes! Chrissy Chaos tires to get his dad joke muscle flexing for the premier of his new TruTV show Backyard Bar Wars. Chris and Vin compare diets. We answer a few questions from the fans! Send your questions to: chrissychaospodcast@gmail.com A Couple Handcuffed Together for 123 Days Immediately Breaks Up Upon Release. Bee's have learned how to open up bottles of soda. Christory Distefano talks the history of Juneteenth. At the end of the episode we have a sneak peek at the content you are missing out on if you are NOT a member of our Patreon!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Logan Paul vs My Daughter | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 20
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos is back on his SOLO in Brooklyn. The NEW baby is almost here! Chris will have his days old baby as a guest on the poddy. Will Chris' daughter Delilah have an issue with having a new baby in the house? Chris ANNOUNCES a new celebrity boxing match! 10 things you didn't know about babies. Chris talks about the surprise baby shower they threw for Vin and it WENT FULL CHAOS! Chrissy movie reviews talks about the new Netflix movie Stowaway. What did the founding fathers sound like? How hard is the citizenship exam in the USA? Chris answers a few questions from the fans YASSSS! Dating advice from Chrissy Chaos....invited the girl to the park and see if she like pizza....THEHOMELESSPIMP and Ti Ti Jerry are going on a romantic helicopter ride around Manhattan at sunset. Sinkholes are terrifying! Is Satan on the rise? Are people trying to make Satan cool? There's some kid on TikTok who is stuck in the year 2027?! WHAT IS GOING ON! Is this purgatory? 48 laws of power YASSSS! FULL CHAOS!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.itunes:summary:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos is back on his SOLO in Brooklyn. The NEW baby is almost here! Chris will have his days old baby as a guest on the poddy. Will Chris' daughter Delilah have an issue with having a new baby in the house? Chris ANNOUNCES a new celebrity boxing match! 10 things you didn't know about babies. Chris talks about the surprise baby shower they threw for Vin and it WENT FULL CHAOS! Chrissy movie reviews talks about the new Netflix movie Stowaway. What did the founding fathers sound like? How hard is the citizenship exam in the USA? Chris answers a few questions from the fans YASSSS! Dating advice from Chrissy Chaos....invited the girl to the park and see if she like pizza....THEHOMELESSPIMP and Ti Ti Jerry are going on a romantic helicopter ride around Manhattan at sunset. Sinkholes are terrifying! Is Satan on the rise? Are people trying to make Satan cool? There's some kid on TikTok who is stuck in the year 2027?! WHAT IS GOING ON! Is this purgatory? 48 laws of power YASSSS! FULL CHAOS!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 

 

This episode Chrissy Chaos is back on his SOLO in Brooklyn. The NEW baby is almost here! Chris will have his days old baby as a guest on the poddy. Will Chris' daughter Delilah have an issue with having a new baby in the house? Chris ANNOUNCES a new celebrity boxing match! 10 things you didn't know about babies. Chris talks about the surprise baby shower they threw for Vin and it WENT FULL CHAOS! Chrissy movie reviews talks about the new Netflix movie Stowaway. What did the founding fathers sound like? How hard is the citizenship exam in the USA? Chris answers a few questions from the fans YASSSS! Dating advice from Chrissy Chaos....invited the girl to the park and see if she like pizza....THEHOMELESSPIMP and Ti Ti Jerry are going on a romantic helicopter ride around Manhattan at sunset. Sinkholes are terrifying! Is Satan on the rise? Are people trying to make Satan cool? There's some kid on TikTok who is stuck in the year 2027?! WHAT IS GOING ON! Is this purgatory? 48 laws of power YASSSS! FULL CHAOS!

item.title: Ayahuasca Lessons with Annie Lederman | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 17
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos is chatting with comedian Annie Lederman from the BloodBath Podcast. They talk Taste Buds and Joe DeRosa. Shout out Homelesspimp! Donnell Rawlings is a great comic who helped them both out. Annie and Chris used to be roommates. Annie talks about her new habit of visualization meditation....that she never does. Annie loves that the CHAOS family is all back together. Stories from back in the day! Shitty New York Apartments and people being creeps. Annie breaks down her Ayahuasca trips and how they impacted her life. MAIL BAG WITH TI TI JERRY! TI TI talks dating apps, crimes that shouldn't be illegal and life behind bars. 48 laws of power and MORE!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Jerry Seinfeld Left Me On Read with Mark Normand | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 14
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos chats with comedian Mark Normand! People need to be hit again things have gotten too easy with the internet. Only let in information that effects your life! YOU CAN'T WORRY ABOUT EVERYTHING. The news cycle is getting desperate! We get it you need clicks SHUT UP. Cancel culture is dumb. Nothing changes just the people alive on Earth. Shout out MagicSpoon! 48 laws of COMEDY! Syphilis is insane. Is America built on bullying? WE NEED IT! Shout out Ryan Reynolds! The boys talk about their open mic days. Jerry Seinfeld ghosted Chris and got mad at Mark Normand. Chris talks about the time he read texts he had sent Jerry on his Patreon! Mark talks about his worst bombs in comedy and how it haunts your memory after. Quarantine saved Mark's relationship with JERRY!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

Mark talks about his worst bombs in comedy and how it haunts your memory after. Quarantine saved Mark's relationship with JERRY!

Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.title: Live From Logan Paul's Living Room | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 12
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos is LIVE from Logan Paul's living room. He told us to come over but wasn't there so we set up a 3 camera shoot in his living room! We sat down and interview Logan Paul's roommates The Truth Experiment, Dwarf Mamba, and David The German. Most the episode we kick it with Jake Broido aka The Truth Experiment who is a DOPE music producer! We bother the people servicing the Paul residence. We find out how people find their way into moving into Logan Paul's creator house. The anxiety that comes with living in a HYPE house. During quarantine Jake left his girl to move in with Logan Paul and Chris got back with his ex and got her pregnant. Life is what you make it BABES. Logan Paul is HOT. Jake talks about the time Tekashi 69 dropped by and hung out with the Logan Paul crew. Tekashi 69 on gangster culture. We find out The Truth Experiment's 5 year plan......Is Logan Paul a positive cult leader? Jake give his advice to Tik Toker's who are almost 30. NFT tips from someone who has made millions doing it! 48 laws of power time! LA is your hot ex girlfriend. TI TI JERRY'S MAIL BOX IS HERE! Ti Ti talks rona and prison ghost stories. The Truth Experiment calls out Joe Rogan for constantly hating on LA. The Truth Experiment talks about how it is to date someone in a wheelchair. This episodes mental health tip is to start microdosing mushrooms and not take yourself seriously. Evan aka Dwarf Mamba wakes up and stumbles on to the show. We talk to him about Tampa, breakfast, and dirtbag life. Chris is gonna just move into Logan Paul's house why the hell not! We find out that David The German is not a real german and is bad in bed. SHOUT OUT LOGAN PAUL SHOUT OUT TI TI YASSSSS!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Stretch Marks & Sharts | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 11
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos is back in action on the couch of the air bnb TruTV got him in LA. Chris wouldn't mind if his kids changed religions. The first installment of Ti Ti Jerry's Mail Bag is here! YASSSS. We had the WORST Easter dinner. DISGUSTING. LA is a mystery and makes no sense. It's a city that's built on insecurity and ego. The day Chris met Magic Johnson and found out the first baby was indeed his. A wild story about Vinny falling down but saving the baby. Vin is going wild for her 3rd pregnancy. Chris talks about a BAD experience he had on edibles in the past. TheHomelessPimp has a WILD story about taking a Uber in LA. Chris doesn't have a wardrobe department on his new tv show. Chris talks about taking a class at Barrys Bootcamp. Chris breaks down whats going on in the ocean after watching the film Seaspiracy. Is it too late to save the ocean? Fish farms are INSANE. TI TI Jerry answers a few fan emails about crypto currency, aliens invading, and her future plans. 48 laws of power teaches us another valuable lesson. Christory Distefano segment gets WILD about Emperor Norton a mentally ill man who declared himself the emperor of the US. The media made him the first Donald Trump for some reason WILD.
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

item.title: Juiced UP with Tom Segura | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 10
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos is chatting with Tom Segura! THINGS GET WILD! The boys talk about steroids and how they wish athletes were just allowed to use them! MAKE SPORTS GREAT AGAIN. Chris talks about the side effects he had from his steroid use. How much better you feel after you loose weight. Leading man face best friend bodies. Tom and Chris talk about how much it sucks to be embarrassed of your body. They share a few stories about how their bodies have embarrassed them over the years. Some WILD stories about Chris' dad. Chris thought Tom was from Ecuador but he's not! Chris read him facts about Ecuador anyway. 48 LAWS OF POWER gets real this week. Then they close out the show on an anxiety tuesday break about how Tom was affected by the BRUTAL injury he had recently.
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.title: Intergalactic Satanists | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 9
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos is back in the Whiskey Ginger studio to bring the CHAOS! The Homelesspimp is coming next week things will get WILD! Vin hates the new expensive air b n b Chris got for the rest of their time in LA. Vin compares it to the Christmas tree Chris cut down for her this past year. Don and Andrew talk about how Donny spread covid to the king ginger. The pyramids are insane! HOW DID THEY HAPPEN?! ALIENS CUZ? Were dinosaurs smart like humans? Were dinosaurs racist? Vin pops on for a quick KISS, Q public schools, the digital world is a mess babe, Chris has taken the bus in the last 3 months, shout out Lil Nas X and satan! Lil Nas taught up that satan is white, the cameras got unplugged for a few mins and no one noticed! Chrissy card limits, it's all about that salt CUZ, 48 laws of power break!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.content:encoded:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 

This episode Chrissy Chaos is back in the Whiskey Ginger studio to bring the CHAOS! The Homelesspimp is coming next week things will get WILD! Vin hates the new expensive air b n b Chris got for the rest of their time in LA. Vin compares it to the Christmas tree Chris cut down for her this past year. Don and Andrew talk about how Donny spread covid to the king ginger. The pyramids are insane! HOW DID THEY HAPPEN?! ALIENS CUZ? Were dinosaurs smart like humans? Were dinosaurs racist? Vin pops on for a quick KISS, Q public schools, the digital world is a mess babe, Chris has taken the bus in the last 3 months, shout out Lil Nas X and satan! Lil Nas taught up that satan is white, the cameras got unplugged for a few mins and no one noticed! Chrissy card limits, it's all about that salt CUZ, 48 laws of power break!

Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.title: Desert Dirt Bags | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 7
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chrissy Chaos and Sergio Chicon AKA BLIZZY are out in the GREAT OUTDOORS CUZ! They are broadcasting from the desert of Arizona like some true dirt bags. They talk about how the weekend of shows is going at the House of Comedy in Phoenix, Arizona. Vinny had to go to the emergency room and Chris falls in love with the healthcare system of Arizona. Our road guy Billy tells us a quality POOP story. They chat about the day they spent at Goldfield Ghost Town, is Sergio Mr.Potato head?!, Vinny thinks the apartment is haunted, Whats really good with cacti?, why are reptile lovers called herps, Then we jump back to Chrissy Chaos on the couch in Brooklyn and we talk Chrissy pilots LA plans for the next few months.
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.title: Fresh Outta Prison with TiTi Jerry | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 6
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chris has on TiTi Jerry who is fresh off serving 25 years in prison. They talk prison reform, what it's like to live in prison for years and years, why stealing is addicting, who are the best lovers in prison, TiTi's friendship with Son of Sam and how he acted in jail, if the money was right it was right!, prison is all about survival and struggle, Ronald DeFeo Jr. who committed the crimes of the Amityville horror was in love with TiTi, the prison hierarchy and how it works, how the first day in prison works for you mentally, being transgender in America, accept who you are life is short!, treat people with respect and don't snitch, officers in prison are dirty and dangerous, TiTi talks about how she had to cut some people to protect one of her husbands, TiTi teaches an enemy a lesson with her poop, how to deal with anxiety in prison.
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.itunes:subtitle: WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! This episode Chris talks about unplugging from social media, The Dissident and what happened to Jamal Khashoggi, a mouse got sucked into his vacuum cleaner, the real story of Abraham Lincoln's assassination, how to name a baby ...
item.itunes:summary:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos!
This episode Chris talks about unplugging from social media, The Dissident and what happened to Jamal Khashoggi, a mouse got sucked into his vacuum cleaner, the real story of Abraham Lincoln's assassination, how to name a baby in 2021, Anxiety Tuesday is all about impact social media has on us all, Chris reveals he used to keep a diary in his mid twenties, 48 Laws of Power teaches us that China is LIT, Learn the limitations of kindness BABES
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.content:encoded:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 

This episode Chris talks about unplugging from social media, The Dissident and what happened to Jamal Khashoggi, a mouse got sucked into his vacuum cleaner, the real story of Abraham Lincoln's assassination, how to name a baby in 2021, Anxiety Tuesday is all about impact social media has on us all, Chris reveals he used to keep a diary in his mid twenties, 48 Laws of Power teaches us that China is LIT, Learn the limitations of kindness BABES

Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!

item.title: Welcome To The Chaos| Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 1
item.description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! This episode Chris goes goes full VIKING mode and gets fully charged to get this podcast off to a YAAASSSS start! Chris talks about having a baby thats gonna be born on 4th of July, His new favorite book the 48 Laws of Power, what is OnlyFans?, and a bunch more!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy
CHRISDCOMEDY.COM for all upcoming live comedy show dates

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/chrisdcomedy/​
Twitter - https://twitter.com/chrisdcomedy​

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD8I...​
Also check out Chris' podcast History Hyenas! EVERY week Chris Distefano and comedian Yannis Pappas dive deep into a history topic and GO WILD!!! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZP_...​ https://www.instagram.com/historyhyen...​
